verbose_text: Our findings of enhanced beta1 integrin subunit glycosylation and abundance on the cell surface of cells over-expressing DDR1 are consistent with earlier data in which variations of beta1 integrin glycosylation regulate integrin trafficking to the cell surface and integrin mediated cell migration, adhesion, and spreading.
evidence: beta1 integrin subunit glycosylation and abundance on the cell surface of cells over-expressing DDR1 are consistent with earlier data in which variations of beta1 integrin glycosylation regulate integrin trafficking to the cell surface               and integrin-mediated cell migration              , adhesion
